content: Hello all, are the 2.16.840.1.133883.* oids for HL7v2 codesystems defined in the FHIR spec correct? Should they be 2.16.840.1.113883.*?
hm. @Ted Klein these OIDS from a document you sent me. Is this a typo?

WTF...definitely a typo, which we discovered from one of the early documents I supplied to you before it had gone through QA, since you needed it fast for a deadline and I told you it might have errors...that error was scrubbed out of the database and the text output for the 2.9 ballot; you may want to check it in FHIR since you may not have corrected the problem in the FHIR spec once we did the QA and corrected it in the V2 source.
Glad to have an authoritative source backing up that those are bad oids. I will be sure to not use them.
